---
title: "`add_field` Action"
---

This `add_field` action is used to add a field to a structure of a table as part of the `ALTER` SQL command.

## Input Parameters

There is a single `msgpack` serialized parameter passed to the action.

```c++
// The base class for all alter parameters.
struct AirportAlterBase
{
  //! Catalog name to alter
  std::string catalog;
  //! Schema name to alter
  std::string schema;
  //! Entry name to alter
  std::string name;
  bool ignore_not_found;
};

struct AirportAlterTableAddFieldParameters : AirportAlterBase
{
  // This is contains the path of the field and the type of the column.
  std::string column_schema;
  bool if_field_not_exists;

  MSGPACK_DEFINE_MAP(catalog, schema, name, ignore_not_found, if_field_not_exists, column_schema);
};

```

## Return Value

The action does not return a value, but should raise a Arrow Flight exception if there is an error.
